summary:
Privacy is consent - Firo is a privacy preserving cryptocurrency and ecosystem.

 Privacy - Firo is at the forefront of cryptocurrency privacy with Lelantus and Lelantus Spark providing trustless, on-chain privacy with high anonymity sets. Dandelion++ technology also provides network-layer privacy.

 Blockchain - Firo uses a hybrid PoW and LLMQ Chainlocks system combining fair distribution of supply with protection against 51% attacks and quick finality of blocks and transactions.

 Privacy Infrastructure - Firo's Elysium tokenization layer allows users to create their own privacy-enabled tokens with use-cases from private stablecoins or voting tokens and in the future offer privacy for bridged assets from other chains.

 Research and Development - Firo stands out as one out of a handful of projects that contribute independent research to blockchain privacy and decentralization technologies such as Sigma, Lelantus, Lelantus Spark and MTP. Our work has played a pivotal role in the space having influenced or been adopted in other projects.

 get firo - Push the frontiers of digital privacy. Join the Firo ecosystem today.
